name: Sweetly Delicious
description: Delivering cones, bags, boxes and kebabs! I provide sweetie filled cones, boxes and bags for all occasions, themes and budgets. Ideal gifts for someone with a sweet tooth!
safetyTips: All goods stored in airtight containers, mask and gloves worn during production, all areas sanitised. Contactless courier deliveries - free local (Reigate) delivery. All surfaces are sanitised prior to production. I wear mask and gloves whilst handling sweets. Contactless collection and courier deliveries.
